song_lyrics: Sadguṇ sāgar Pramukh Swāmī vandan karīe shirnāmī,
Sādhutānā range vā’lam jash vadhāryo duniyāmā...
Dariyāv dilne hetāḷ haiyu nīrmaḷ antar nishkāmī,
Karuṇābhīnī ānkho vā’lam jash vadhāryo duniyāmā..tame 1
Yagnapurushjīe oḍhāḍī chādar bhagvī guṇiyal rūpāḷī,
Sāgar pār pahochāḍī vā’lam jash vadhāryo duniyāmā..tame 2
Yogī Mahārāje āshīsh dīdhā antar vasīyā bahunāmī,
Hetnā megh varsāvyā vā’lam jash vadhāryo duniyāmā..tame3
Sharaṇāgatne sukhīyā kīdhā bhavbhavnī bhāngī khāmī,
Bhakti bhīnā kīdhā vā’lam jash vadhāryo duniyāmā..tame 4
Sansār vīshthī jīvane ugāryo amrut pāyu avatārī,
Akshar deh dharīne āje jash vadhāryo duniyāmā..tame 5
title: Sadguṇ sāgar Pramukh Swāmī vandan karīe shirnāmī

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-185: Sadhu Aksharjivandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
